thread.title: Write-Downs Abound for Oil Producers
thread.title_full: Write-Downs Abound for Oil Producers - WSJ

author: Ryan Dezember
title: Write-Downs Abound for Oil Producers
text:
U.S. oil-and-gas producers have written down the value of their drilling fields by more in 2015 than any full year in history, as the rout in commodity prices makes properties across the country not worth drilling.
A group of 66 oil and gas producers have taken impairment charges totaling $59.8 billion through June, according to a tally by energy consultancy IHS Herold Inc. That tops the previous full-year record of $48.5 billion set...
